title: REDEEMED
description: Contemporary American Theater Festival presents REDEEMED by Chisa Hutchinson, directed by Marcus D. Harvey. The story unfolds over two prison visitations between Claire Yiang, whose brother was murdered, and Trevor Barlow, the murderer, as they navigate themes of redemption and guilt.
address: 59E59 Theaters, a quick block from SUBWAY 4/5/6 N/W/R at 59 St.
